snippet: Denver Broncos defensive lineman Antonio Smith is a rarity in the NFL: He does not get injured. The Super Bowl will mark his 179th appearance in 180 games since the middle of the 2005 season, a decade of astonishingly good health in a relentlessly...
lead_paragraph: Denver Broncos defensive lineman Antonio Smith is a rarity in the NFL: He does not get injured. The Super Bowl will mark his 179th appearance in 180 games since the middle of the 2005 season, a decade of astonishingly good health in a relentlessly violent sport.

headline.main: AP Survey: NFL Players Question Teams' Attitudes on Health
headline.print_headline: AP Survey: NFL Players Question Teams' Attitudes on Health
